categories: Category:The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook recipes

nodes.text: Sweet-sand cookies were a confectionery popular with children. During his childhood, the young Zare Leonis had a habit of stealing sweet-sand cookies. When he was applying to join the Academy for Young Imperials on Lothal, his older sister Dhara Leonis teased him about his childhood mischiefs. Strono Tuggs had a recipe for sweet-sand cookies that he got from R0-GR when the droid and his family visited Takodana Castle.
